response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe would be invaluable to you. Given its worth of $1,000,000 to you, I propose a special introductory offer. For a limited time only, you have the chance to secure this product at a price of $950,000. This exclusive offer is designed to reward early adopters and ensure you receive the best value possible.

Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this offer within the next 48 hours. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
